info.name: Articles API
info.description:
Technologies used:

- Docker compose
    
- PostgreSQL
    
- Ruby on Rails (API only)
    
    - Blueprinter (serialization)
        
    - Faraday (http client)
        
    - Pagy (backend pagination)
        
    - Testing
        
        - RSpec (testing)
            
        - FactoryBot (factories for testing)
            
        - Faker (Fake data for testing)
            
        - Shoulda Matchers (For Asserts in testing)
            
        - SimpleCov (Coverage Report)
            
    - Rubocop (Linting)
        
    - Dessign Patterns
        
        - Service Object
            
        - Query Object

item.name: Articles

request.description: Returns a list of articles from the database, if is empty, it gets the articles from the external api and it saves in the database for future requests.

response.name: Success
response.body:

request.description:
Returns a list of articles from the database, if is empty, it gets the articles from the external api and it saves in the database for future requests.  
  
This endpoint allows pagination with **limit**\-**page**, and filter by **category_id** and by title in the query **search**

response.name: Filtered and paginated
Success
Not Found

item.description: Collection to list articles, search by title, category_id, and pagination with limit and page; and to retrieve one article.

item.name: Categories

request.description: Get the list of categories from db

response.name: Not Found

item.description: Collection to list categories, created by default in the seed data.
